channel.title: The 3G Sounds Podcast
channel.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
channel.description: If you like a podcast that wakes you up in the morning with a cuppa, packed full of news and reviews of the week's telly, film, drinks and a lot of British banter, then welcome home. With madly epic British banter being exclaimed to the max, we're the perfect way to liven up any 45 minutes of your fortnight! The 3G Sounds Podcast, the radio show that's not on radio! See our weblog at podcast.3gsounds.co.uk
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Unmistakably British Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: If you like a podcast that wakes you up in the morning with a cuppa, packed full of news and reviews of the week's telly, film, drinks and a lot of British banter, then welcome home. The 3G Sounds Podcast, the radio show that's not on radio!
channel.copyright: © 2008-2011 3G Sounds. All rights reserved. Use of podcast, audio contents or original features commercially must be submitted for request to the details outlined on the website. Featured music copyright of their respective artists.
channel.itunes:keywords: Comedy, Entertainment, Technology, News, Reviews, Drinks, unmistakably, british, top, 100, super, mario

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 47 - The Farewell Episode
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
So this is it folks. After 47 episodes the gang are parting their own ways for now. Chris sets to tear down the studio, Ed doesn't act as though it's the end at all, we review Guarana Antarctica and Fanta Furu Furu Shaker, get the low down on TV, 3D Films and the .xxx domain in Tech, as well as that usual favourite of Top 100. Thanks to everyone who's listened and loved the show for the last 4 years, it's been a blast.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

Twitter - Facebook

Show Notes:

Presenters: Seb King, Chris Kalcov, Edward T

Created by: Seb King

Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

Length: 01:11:33

Audio Rate: 96kb/s

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 46
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Back for the last few of the summer season, Ed, Matt and Chris are in the sweltering studio talking Murdoch, Apple, Harry Potter and an absurd amount of television and film reviews! Ed also reviews a Japanese drink called Sweat (which tastes it too) and the duo go head to head in a 5-minute violin showdown in this week's Versus of the Week.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 45 (Filler)
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
As the team are on break this June (some of us have exams in Oxbridge to be doing don't you know) we're taking you back in time to a podcast we never released till now! A rare insight to one from our 'Filler' series, here's an unreleased show we recorded on 20th May 2010 with Matt, Ed and Chris, probably including the news of yesteryear! Now if you excuse me, I must go dust the studio.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

Twitter - Facebook

Presenters: Chris Kalcov, Edward T, Matt O'Keeffe

Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

Audio Rate: 135kb/s (Weird, I know)

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 44
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
After the world's longest pub crawl, the team are back (they lost Matt along the way) from the Uxbridge Arms to do the next show, with Annie guesting! Packed with the latest news, talibanter, a drinks review of Meantime Champagne and Fanta Grape, it's potentially our last podcast before the world ends on May 21st! We also bring back Gambi's Big Boffin Quiz, for one night only.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds St. George's Day Special 2011 - Live from the Uxbridge Arms
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
This is it folks! It's St. George's Day and we're live from the Uxbridge Arms pub in Notting Hill, complete with in-house live musicians, the latest news, (a bit more drunken) banter and patriotic tales from this incredibly historical pub. Emmett Cruddas talks about UK music while Ed exclaims his disgust at everything in the cinema, and the folks out for a pint talk about why they love being British.

Check our website and blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 43
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
The team are in the studio very late tonight on April Fools Day, where Chris takes Seb's job of the script and gives up his microphone for the week. Matt and Ed go head to head in the Wikipedia Game for Versus of the Week, and we bring you the very latest in news-in-banter, Ed's imaginary friend Rowenta (his greatest fan), otter impressions, a sponsored review of Belvoir Ginger Beer, film, music and tv reviews, you name it! It's a jam-packed podcast before our St. George's Day Special Live at the Uxbridge Arms

Check out what we're up to at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb's back into 3G Sounds for the first time in months, and the podcast turns controversial pretty quick. We cover Japan, review Lucky Cider (from Japan), rip apart 'Friday' by Rebecca Black as well as everything that's been trending in the last fortnight!

item.description:
All the team are in for the new year with the big four-oh, avec lots of controversial topics and plosives. Ed and Matt kick off a new feature where they go head to head in Beat The Intro for this year's music on the radio, we review the best Ginger Beer in history as well as all your favourite news, film reviews and TV from the last fortnight. item.title: 3G Sounds Christmas Special 2010
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Braving the inches of snow and useless London transport, all the gang are in the studio this week for the last time to round off the year! With everything from the super special christmas jingles, to the month's roundoffs of the Apprentice, Strictly, X-Factor as well as your intake of news, banter and the podcast premiere of the new single 'Dabee Dooba Christmas' by The Two Degrees. We'll be back in the New Year's with new band interviews and more of your favourite here at 3G Sounds. Till then, Merry Christmas to all!

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 39
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Everyone's in the studio this week, except for Seb who was enjoying a Sunday Roast, and the team discuss everything from live F1 results, to the week's TV in the UK and the most extended (and horrible) set of drinks reviews we've ever done, including the first ever -1! Will it be the Stewarts series, Lavender Soda, Carpe Diem or the energy drinks we picked up in Prague? We also talk all the fortnight's news, films and Chris does his... thaang.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 38
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
The long awaited new series kicks off in style this October with Seb, Chris and Matt in a brand-spanking new studio! With all new features and banter, this week's podcast covers the latest Apple tech news, Chilean miners, British TV, films, music by Short Circuit Device and a drinks review of Pepsi Throwback. All the best bits of the fortnight in a nutshell!

This week's podcast is sponsored by Audible at www.audiblepodcast.com/3gsounds - Get a free audiobook, no strings attached! 

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Summer Special 2010
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
The entire team are in this summer's day for our annual summer special, complete with live studio audience, an unnecessarily large amount of... everything, and it's also a sad day as Ed gives his last official appearance on 3G Sounds as a presenter. We even have a live ofcom administrator - JDC - in to set our banter straight! The usual features, which you know you love! Really.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 37
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Gabbi Machado joins a full studio today for this very loud, manic podcast packed full of games, the week's TV, epic Dewmocracy drinks reviews, a lot of World Cup (which we were watching while recording this) and a tad bit too many innuendos! Ah well, it's the London heatwave over here and we couldn't turn on the fans, so that's a feasable explanation! The banter scale kinda goes off the chart, and we throw all professionalism out the window, just for this week.

This week's podcast is sponsored by Audible at www.audiblepodcast.com/3gsounds - Get a free audiobook, no strings attached!

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 36
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb is back in the studio this week with Matt and Chris for this week's podcast covering absolutely everything from the iPad launch to Eurovision banter! We also check out the latest YouTube crazes, films and TV and since Ed's not around today we review a new root beer from his 'meh' list and we're pleasantly surprised!

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

This week's podcast is sponsored by Audible.com. For a free audiobook of your choice, hit up www.audiblepodcast.com/3gsounds ! Our personal choice this episode is Ross Kemp on...pretty much anything.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 35
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Matt, Chris and Ed kick off the new eighth series with guest and music critic Emmett over Skype, who seems to bring a sense of seriousness with him (which isn't a bad thing). Featuring the news of the last month (sorry about that) and plenty of music and film reviews, as well as the podcast premiere of the new song by Hella Better Dancer "Hands" from the Roundhouse Album. Also with clips of our latest gig and a drinks review of the best root beer on Earth.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

Seb the non-existent presenter is replaced with Matt in the studio this week for the last podcast of series 7, complete with the most review-heavy podcast ever! Including the latest NON-BIASED film reviews, TV reviews on Skins and The Bill and a drinks review of Jolt Cola. Also the most heated Top 100 ever witnessed! We'll be back in three weeks with a podcast from Prague! Unmistakably Czech? That doesn't really work.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 32
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb calls off for a bit of man flu this week, so he's replaced by Matt for a podcast so against the beliefs of Seb if he were to hear it he would literally die. The trio talk this week about world news, the Apple tablet and the Iraq inquiry, as well as swapping film reviews for TV reviews, as well as your usual favourites 'Name of the Game', 'Top 100', a drinks review of Mountain Dew Blue Raspberry and a track by the team (who all happen to be saxophonists) where we call ourselves Saxual DisFUNKtion. Genius.

Check our website and weblog at www.3gsounds.co.uk for quirky news and drinks reveiws or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

Special thanks to AmericanSoda.co.uk and Bull's Head Pub, Barnes for making this episode possible.

item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb, Chris and Ed kick off the new year with a new season, new mugs and new features, banter on about news from The Metro and discuss our gadget of the decade. Also with the most anticipated drinks review of the year (well, 2009), Jolt Blue Raspberry! Plus a new game Ed just invented now, cleverly entitled 'The New Game' (Originally 'The Game', but we thought you'd kill us), and a track from The Myth Machine.

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

Twitter - Facebook

Created by: Seb King

Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

item.title: 3G Sounds Christmas Special 2009
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb, Chris and Edward T in come together for the first time in ages for a Christmas Special complete with a DOUBLE JAPANESE drinks review, a certainly interesting Top 100 and the 3G Sounds review of the decade. We give our final impressions of the film Avatar as well as your usual review of the last fortnig...well 2 months including what's surprisingly topping the UK charts and, in typical Britishness, the weather as provided by the BBC. We'll be back in the New Year's with new band interviews and more of your favourite banter. Till then, Merry Christmas to all!

Check our website and news blog at www.3gsounds.co.uk or email us at shout@3gsounds.co.uk

Twitter - Facebook

item.title: We've Moved to Mevio!
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Chris K explains that we've moved all of our podcast episode files over to our new Mevio channel from Odeo which means that if you're viewing this on either Odeo or iTunes with the heading "The New 3G Sounds Podcasts", ironically it's the old one. This means that all of our new podcast episodes will be posted on our Mevio channel (3gsounds.mevio.com) or our new iTunes channel (pending) as well as our website, but not on Odeo or our old iTunes channel so be warned and update your bookmarks! For more info see our website at www.3gsounds.co.uk

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 29 - Halloween Special
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Halloween's here so Seb puts on his creepy Tony Blair mask and who better to bring into the studio than Conan M back to reclaim his title in Top 100! Including lots of thunder sounds, strange narratives, Right Hook Ruin and a summary of the last fortnight including real (cough) audio clips from Nick Griffin's interview in Question Time on BBC. Also a drinks review (without Ed, sadly) of Mountain Dew Supernova complete with a strange minor version of the theme to make things scaryieryier.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 28
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb and Chris are the alone in the studio this week as Ed takes up a case of man flu, so they fill time with a huge selection of banter from the last fortnight as well as two tracks from Right Hook Ruin and Hella Better Dancer. We do the drinks review anyway, regardless, and we talk about the new 3G Sounds website, a goat born with a human head and Gordon Brown developing a like for chocolate biscuits.
Presenters: Seb King, Chris Kalcov Created by: Seb King Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov Length: 00:43:59 Audio Rate: 96kb/s Size: 30.2MB

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 27
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Literally everyone's in the studio this week, so many people that we needed an extra chair! On the 3G Sofa is Edward T and Matt O'Keeffe, and we're joined by special guest singer Gabriela Machado, who brought her guitar with her to play us a choon (as well as other psychic related subjects when Matt interviews her). Featuring your fortnightly dose of news, features and banter, this podcast is the round up of all things relevant in the last fortnight, including Derren Brown - real or fake? (It's pretty obvious who you think will say he's real)
Remember you can visit us online at 3gsounds.co.uk, send your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.
Presenters: Seb King, Chris Kalcov Guests: Gabriela Machado, Edward T, Matt O'Keeffe Created by: Seb King Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 26 - Because we missed 25
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb, Chris and Edward T are in the studio this week, along with some Hella Better Dancer, a film review of District 9, the news from the Apple iPod event and Obama calling Kanye West a jackass. What more could happen in a fortnight? Also, Ed tries to reclaim his title in Top 100, and we establish a new feature - Super Marioland Live - how fast can you finish the first level of Super Mario for GameBoy? <a href="http://britcaster.com" title="1c399da888fd9845ca8d18f03bbccafb">Feeding BritCaster.com</a><!--[1c399da888fd9845ca8d18f03bbccafb]-->

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 24
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: 3G Sounds kicks off the new series with a set of new jingles, featuring the lovely voice of Gina Mellotte. This week's guest on the 3G Sofa is the infamous James D'Costa, who tries to set things straight in the studio by forcing Seb to actually organise the podcast. Edward T is at a funeral this week, so Seb takes over the drinks review with the - cough - best drink we've ever had, and we feature our new resident band, Right Hook Ruin, as well as a great game of Top 100. Also with the best news from the last fortnight.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast - Avatar Review
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: AVATAR!!!!!! In this special 3G Sounds Podcast we bring you the review of the Avatar premiere at the BFI IMAX in London as part of an Avatar Day Special. Hear the summary of the film and its many flaws and why it will change the face of cinema forever. Also hear why Seb was sick after seeing it. Presented by Seb King and Chris Kalcov, and recorded just after the premiere ON AVATAR DAY!!! w00t.

item.title: 3G Sounds Summer Special 2009
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
The 3G Team are back finally for the last podcast of the series with this week's piano-guest, Olly Greally. Due to weeks worth of unplanning, this turned out to be quite a regular podcast, but we figured we'd throw in a piano solo at the end. Featuring greats such as Top 100, an drinks review of Mountain Dew and such, but this time organised in a topsy-turvy way thanks to Seb's bright idea. Also available in 3D. Join us again in the second half of August for the new series, where the team will be interviewing people of stupidly high IQ, as well as more of your favorite British banter here at 3G Sounds. Have a great summer!
Remember you can visit us online at www.3gsounds.co.uk, send your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.
Presenters: Seb King, Chris Kalcov Guests: Edward T, Olly Greally Created by: Seb King Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov
Length: 00:50:28 Audio Rate: 96kb/s Size: 34.7MB

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 23
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Out a bit late due to technical difficulties, the 3G Team are back this week for the penultimate Summer's On podcast with this week's guest, Conan, who last featured in the Xmas Special. We've scratched Gambi's Big Boffin Quiz for Top 100, a game full of shouting random words. We discuss proper news including Wimbledon, Seb's trip to the US of A and the (scariest) fastest rapper in the world, as well as a drinks review of another of Bundaberg's greats and a LOT of twitteration!
Remember you can visit us online at 3gsounds.co.uk, send your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.
Presenters: Seb King, Chris Kalcov Guests: Edward T, Conan M Created by: Seb King Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 22
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Back for the second week of Summer's On, the 3G Team are in the 35-degree studio to dreadfully record another podcast. And it shows. It's safe to say not the best of our podcasts, but hey, the heat was on. Hosted this week by Edward T while Seb spends his whole time playing on the iPod Touch, this podcast involves a lot of loud noises and pointless plosives. Oh, and this one isn't recommended for hardcore Micahel Jackson fans either. Enjoy!
Remember you can visit us online at 3gsounds.co.uk, send your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.
Presenters: Edward T, Chris Kalcov Guests: Seb King Created by: Not sure this time Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 21
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Here for the first week of the 'Summer's On' season, Seb and Chris join up with Edward T and Matt O'Keeffe for what possibly could be the most organised podcast yet! The 3G Team talk Iran, Obama swatting a fly, tech news covering E3 and WWDC, strange news which you want to know just for the hell of it, as well as the most sensical GBBQ so far! w00t! Also including Matt going back in time to the Latin period, the KORG synth and Skat. Check back next week for the second installment!
Remember you can visit us online at 3gsounds.co.uk, send your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.
Presenters: Seb King, Chris Kalcov Guests: Edward T, Matt O'Keeffe Created by: Seb King Audio Engineer/Series Producer: Chris Kalcov

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 20 (Filler)
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Due to various shennanigans (I hope I spelled that right) this week, we bring you a filler podcast recorded a few months ago. As with all future fillers, a different presenter will host, and this week it's Edward T with Seb on the 3G Sofa, talking about things probably not relevant today. I mean, sheesh, what is a today-podcast without Gambi's Big Boffin Quiz? Don't hold your breath though, because next week we'll be starting our line of weekly podcasts up to the Summer Special, featuring guests such as Jazz pianist Olly Greally. Until then, endure this.
Remember you can visit us online at 3gsounds.co.uk, send your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 19
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Seb, Chris and Edward T are in the having-been-90-degrees-rotated-clockwise studio this week to summarise the last fortnight in all its glory, including views on MP's expenses, film reviews (including Angels and Demons), a drinks review on an old classic, Orangina. Also featuring an organised GBBQ which didn't turn out so organised after all. Also, Edward T tries out the new KORG synth for Nintendo DS and Chris breaks the mixer by trying to plug a headphone into the microphone slot.
Remember you can visit us online at 3gsounds.co.uk, share your views to yourviews@3gsounds.co.uk and see photos from this podcast on our Facebook page.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 18 - On Location
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb and Chris pack up the on-the-go stu-di-o to harsh the London Underground to Imperial College this week to interview The Takes. We take a break from the regular News and Drinks Reviews for Seb to interview Jack, Hugo, John, Peter and Rams for a full half hour with his huge range of questions, along with a live performance of two of their new songs (as of yet unreleased) and an interesting test of our new swear-cut system.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 17
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Back for the fifth season, we have a full-house this week with Seb, Chris, Edward T and Matt to bring you neeew features such as 'Gambi's Big Boffin Quiz' and film reviews, as well as the best ever Skat and all the usual features of the podcast. Seb discusses his recent attendance of the Premiere of Raiders of the Lost Ark, and we discuss with Matt on his recent world-record attempt to consume the largest number of bananas in one minute.

item.title: 3G Sounds Easter Special 2009
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Chris K presents 30 minutes of non-stop remixed DnB music to mark the Easter season (no idea how they relate to each other). Featuring music by Tekno Eddie, Top Notch, Skunksaver, Morr and Cag. Sorry that a proper special didn't take place, we all were a bit short on time (except for Seb, but he can't do a podcast on his own). Join us all again in May for the next series of 3G Sounds podcasts, where we'll be doing numerous interviews, and possibly a Street Fighter tournament! See you then!
Featured music is CC Licsenced.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 16
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: The last in our fourth series, Seb And Chris are with Edward T this week to close up for the Easter season. Featuring 'The Olds' in Victorian Times, 'The News', as well as a drinks review of something I can't remember while writing this, and a game of Skat over Rhythm Changes. Your usual fortnightly dose of comedy and banter, oh yes. Be sure to check back on us in a month's time for the new series, as well as our Easter Special to take place in a fortnight! See you then!

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 15
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Gathered to experiece Friday the 13th for the second time this year, Seb and Chris meet up again with Edward T to discuss antics which have taken place across the country in the last month (Sorry for missing a podcast last fortnight). As a return, we've recorded backup podcasts just in case! Featuring the new feature which is the new feature, as well as Skat, the new hoedown but better. Also including The News and The Olds, and a good old drinks review of Ka - Black Grape...and Chris' worst ever sound engineering.

item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: In the studio on Valentine's Day are guest presenter Edward T and this week's guest, Shem, as well as another track from The Takes. Featuring a drinks review and a lot of other craps. Also, the first podcast we've done recorded completely in one take!

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 13
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: The unlucky-numbered podcast, Chris and Seb are in the redesigned Attic Studio with guest presenter this week Matt on the 3G Couch. Featuring news on Barack Obama and any other news we could get from Friday's Metro Newspaper, as well as more details on The Takes, the first recorded radio broadcast of Half Empty Glasses, upcoming gigs and concerts. Oh, and also a lot of hullabaloo (If I spelled that right) with Seb.

item.title: 3G Sounds Xmas Special 2008
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: The annual 3G Sounds Xmas Special is back with our version of A Christmas Carol, with this week's guest, Conan. What better way is there to finish off the year...There may be better, but it's still a laugh! Featuring Edward T as Scrooge, Chris as the ghost of Christmas Past, Conan as A. Crotchet - It's a musical joke - and Seb as a rather impatient narrator. Join us again in January for the next set of 3G Sounds Podcasts but until then, Merry Christmas from all of us!

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 12
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb, Chris and Edward T are in the studio this week, telling lies to you all as to why we've been gone for the last month. Edward brings along his new feature for the podcast, Edward's Drinks reviews, and this week's guest, Jack Collins, talks to us on Skype about his band, The Takes, and pretty much everything else, much to the annoyance of Seb. Also including a new track by...some band which Chris ruins with the volume, but otherwise "The News!" is here as usual.

item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: One of the most unprepared-for podcasts, Seb, Chris and Matt finish filming Idiosyncratic Habits and take the liberty of discussing film reviews, television and very briefly on the credit crunch. No tech news this time as the latest tech news in the last 3 weeks officially sucks. Also including the premiere of 3G Sounds Mix: 'Strange Level'.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 10
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb, Chris, Edward T and Matt meet up for this podcast which was recorded just after filming the first episode of Idiosyncratic Habits, and they're about to set off for this year's London Thames Festival (except Seb). Including tech news with Edward T, American politics, the LHC, random give-me-money songs, and pretty much everything else. Actually, it's quite a hard one to detail. Includes The News! and Falteninstitut

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 9
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
Back after the summer, Seb and Chris reopen 3G Sounds podcasts with news on the end of the Beijing Olympics, as well as the long-awaited explanation of the Falteninstitut, the new game "Skyped" as well as "The News!"
Also shortened to half an hour for your on-the-go needs!

Back after the summer, Seb and Chris reopen 3G Sounds podcasts with news on the end of the Beijing Olympics, as well as the long-awaited explanation of the Falteninstitut, the new game "Skyped" as well as "The News!"

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 8
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description:
The last in the second series of 3G Sounds Podcasts, Seb and Chris close the set with a few laughs due to their standard Britishness, as well as a heck of a lot of ‘The News!’ including the data capacity of a brain and the Wimbeldon tennis championships.
Join us again in September 2008 for the beginning of the third series with a huge range of new guests, 3G Sounds Mixes, as well as the long awaited explanation of the Falteninstitut. Join us then and thanks for the support throughout the series, including those who supported us in the podcast we recorded in Austria.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 7
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb and Chris are on their own this time with an unfortunate lack of background music due to a corrupt computer. Random discussions lead into a Skype-cast chat with Americans on how British people rule, a preview of the upcoming Awok and Amule as well as a quick hoedown resulting in the studio going up in flames. Oh dear.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 6
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: In this episode, Sebastian King is away for the week and Chris is left alone with Edward T and Matthew O Keeffe again, having come back from a gig in the heart of Thames Valley. Stuck with nothing to do but technical news and make random experimental music, the trio find themselves squeezing in a very fast hoedown at the end. Also featuring the first premiere of 4 new 3G Sounds Mixes: Block Change, Fat Fish Remix, Industrious Robots and Trying to be Real.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 5
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb and Chris are back with leading singer and bari sax player Matthew O’Keeffe on a discussion about Thursday’s London Mayor elections as well as other interesting stuff such as the film review of Iron Man, and a good old game of hoe-down. Oh, and The News! is back as well.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 4
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: A fairly unprepared-for podcast, Seb and Chris meet up with Edward T again to discuss a huge range of non-related subjects: everything from Windows 7 to the presidential elections in the USA and Zimbabwe, even to the Grand Nationals here in the UK.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 3
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: In this rather noisy podcast, Seb, Chris and Edward enjoy an evening meal recorded live in Salzburg, Austria with Stewart S and Michael G, as we discuss our disgust of Austrian food and food standards. May contain rather disturbing food descriptions and noises. Nice. (Not to listen to while eating something)

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 2
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: Seb and Chris interview Edward T, the scatting legend, on his views on the iPod Touch and his upcoming 3G Sounds ablum, ‘edwardt’, as well as a few performances by the guy himself. Oh, and some Austria news.

item.title: 3G Sounds Podcast 1
item.itunes:author: 3G Sounds
item.description: The First Podcast of the new series with Sebastian King and Chris Kalcov, including a few old 3G tunes, as well as testing out the new Skype call in service with Thomas Simonds-Gooding.
